features: VAGINAL ODOR: pH-D Instant Vaginal Odor Rinse is made with boric acid and purified water and can be used for feminine odor. It can be used with pH-D Boric Acid Vaginal Suppositories and pH-D Body Fresh Spray as a complete system.
SAFE, HOLISTIC INGREDIENTS YOU CAN TRUST: Made with boric acid and purified water. Boric acid, a compound found in sea water.
HOW IT WORKS: Each bottle is a one-time use that is an immediate option for reducing vaginal odor. Can also be used to cleanse vaginal secretions from intercourse or your period.
QUALITY YOU CAN TRUST: pH-D is the only boric acid brand that owns and operates their own manufacturing facility, ensuring the highest safety standards. Made with quality ingredients in the USA.
WOMAN-FOUNDED. DOCTOR TRUSTED. Developed by a woman who worked in the pharmaceutical industry. The pH-D brand is trusted by millions of women.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Built & Backed By Research Built & backed by research pH-D Feminine Health was developed in partnership with physicians who understand and know feminine care. Women-Owned, Women-Run Deeannah Seymour created pH-D Feminine Health to provide trustworthy, holistic feminine care products to help women feel confident and comfortable. When To Use For Instant FreshnessTo cleanse and eliminate feminine odorTo support feminine careDuring or after your period How To Use Uncap container with solution and remove sealRemove overwrap on nozzle and twist onto the container with solutionUse while sitting on the toilet, standing in the shower or in the tubCarefully insert nozzle approximately 3 inches into the vagina then squeeze the bottle from the bottom until most of the liquid is dispensed.Solution should flow out of the vagina.

pH-D Feminine Health - First Woman-Owned Boric Acid Suppositories pH-D Feminine Health - Boric Acid Moisturizing Suppository pH-D Feminine Health - Boric Acid Foam Wash (Sensitive) pH-D Feminine Health - Instant Odor Rinse with Boric Acid pH-D Feminine Health - Boric Acid Body Fresh Spray (Rose Vanilla Scent) pH-D Feminine Health - Boric Acid Starter Bundle Size 24 Count 14 Count 6 Fl. Oz. 3 Fl. Oz. 3 Fl. Oz. 36 Count / 5 Count Form Suppository Moisturizing Suppository Foam Wash Rinse Spray Suppository / Applicator Description pH-D Boric Acid Suppositories are your go-to for a safe, effective, and holistic solution for odor. pH-D Boric Acid Moisturizing Suppositories are your go-to for a safe, effective, and holistic solution for odor while also moisturizing. pH-D Boric Acid Foam Wash is the only boric acid foam wash on the market. pH-D Boric Acid Foam Wash is pH-balanced, paraben free, and plant-based. Our Instant Odor Rinse is a holistic solution to resolve odor. Use when you want instant freshness before intimacy and during or after your period Freshen up with our lightly scented rose vanilla Boric Acid Body Fresh spray designed to neutralize odor anywhere on the body. This bundle includes one (1) pH-D Boric Acid Suppository 12 count bottle and three (3) Suppository Applicators.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product is small and simple to use. It is very effective and only needs to be used once. Only use periodically as needed. I’m very sensitive, and use the least amount of products as possible. I’ve been using this product for a couple of years after a friend recommended it. I’ll continue to use it when the time arises.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is so quick and easy. Better than the pill that you have to insert

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Does exactly what it’s supposed to. Leaves a clean feeling, no residue or bad smell. I have been using this product for a few months now after my period and it makes me feel cleaner and fresher. I have not had any issues or irritations with this product. I have recommended it to friends and they all have had positive experiences with this product as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: You immediately start feeling fresher, no tingling or unwanted sensation.. Will buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Taking off one star because everytime I order this the package always comes smashed or broken which is irritating because it's not that hard to properly package something so that doesn't happen.... Besides that the product itself comes intact with no issues and works very well for me I always make sure I never run out! I'm super happy I found this company! I used to suffer from yeast infections a lot but ever since I combined the instant odor rinse, their suppositories and their vaginal foaming shower wash I have not had a single yeast infection! This product is nice because it does give you a nice clean feeling once you are done and peace of mind knowing you are douching with good clean safe ingredients that will not give you any issues or throw anything off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I swear by this now!!
reviews.reviewText: I now swear by this product. Everytime I'm going to "see someone" I use this just for that extra comfort that I'm going to smell better or like nothing at all. It makes me so much more confident when I'm going out!! It's so simple to use, and I am going to keep purchasing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product does exactly as it says however, for the cost it’s not worth it
It's completely my fault but this is only one treatment. I tried to find out how many treatments but could not. Yes it works but very expensive for only one treatment.
